questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A sculpture and tree around it

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) An art installation
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A neon-lit elephant sculpture
B) A group of people
C) A building
D) A natural landscape

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A sculpture of an elephant with long legs
C) A bench
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Trees and foliage
C) A cityscape
D) A lake

A) A pathway
B) Grass and plants
C) A fountain
D) A playground

A) Classical sculpture

D) Painting

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

D) Dog

A) Two
B) Three
C) Four
D) Six

A) Realistic

C) Impressionistic
D) Minimalistic

B) Artificial light
C) Both natural and artificial light

A) Black
B) White
C) Brown
D) Grey

B) Standing

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow
